title: Chapter 1: The Wreck on the Devon Coast.

book.title: Under Drake's Flag
book.description: 简介： It was a Stormy morning in the month of May, 1572; and the fishermen of the little village of Westport, situate about five miles from Plymouth, clustered in the public house of the place; and discussed, not the storm, for that was a common topic, but...
